*div1 type="summary"* *p*Francis Biggam to Austin, January 8, 1825. Emigration from Mississippi. Transportation routes. Prejudice and falsehood delay development of Austin's colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Monroe Missippi*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="1-8-1825">January 8—182*/date_mentioned*5*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Cornle Austin*/person_mentioned*>*/p*
*p*Sir I now for the first time Cince I left you embrace the oppertunity to write to inform you of my Situation and interest relitive to the *location_mentioned*brases*/location_mentioned* and the reasons of my Detenshions Cinse I Came home I have been in *location_mentioned*Georgia*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*South Carolina*/location_mentioned* and should have started to the *location_mentioned*Brasses*/location_mentioned* imadeantly on my arival from *location_mentioned*Georgia*/location_mentioned* if I was not compeled to attend two suits of law which I had instituated some time before I went out to see you one for the *person_mentioned*killer*/person_mentioned* of my *person_mentioned*negroe*/person_mentioned* and the oather against a *person_mentioned*villin */person_mentioned*for altring a Hog marke which will bee Detarmed in all in *date_mentioned n="04-xx-1825">Aprile*/date_mentioned* and I then flatter my self that some time in may I shall have the pleasure of seeing you acompined by my *person_mentioned*brouther */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*as it will not bee in *person_mentioned*Merritt */person_mentioned* 's power to Come for a short time as hee has a great Deale of business to sittle but will bring a *person_mentioned*hand */person_mentioned*to improve his piase I shall bring my *person_mentioned*familey */person_mentioned*by water and am about to start to *location_mentioned*orlains*/location_mentioned* to procure a vessel for that purpose *person_mentioned*Mr. Williams*/person_mentioned* the bearer of this has confirmed me in my most sanguin oppinion of the *location_mentioned*brasses [Brazos]*/location_mentioned* being the most Desirable part of the Continant I have said and Don every thing I Could in its favour but how can I stand against prejudice and folshoods but time will Dispele the hate and I hope I shall live to see it improve and flurish I have been informed that you have Designated my lands and I have now Doubt but there situation in point of advantage is Calculated to please on my arival as I have made loud expetations on that head as I often thinke and speake of the *location_mentioned*lands on the mile*/location_mentioned* — [illegible] as that seems to bee my favourat spot but shall ref ar all to my arivale as I flater my self that I shall ever find a Cincere friend in you for if I was not confirmed in that opinion I Could [be] happy and make money where I am you will present my best wishes to all my *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*with you *person_mentioned*Mr Tong Corle Pettes*/person_mentioned* and familey *person_mentioned*Mr Bell*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*familey */person_mentioned*and all acquentences I Could sitt and write a volum to you on the subject of the *location_mentioned*braces [Brazos*/location_mentioned*] but as the time is short [until] I shall arive I will wave the subject to then and I hope you will accept my best wishes for your health and happiness and that I shall soon bee one to ad to the number of your *location_mentioned*Contry*/location_mentioned* and as such I will subscribe my self your friend and obt St.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Fkas Biggam [Francis]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Do give my love to your *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
